name: Mobile Game Development - Midterm
description: Buggy Dash is a tedious jump course that will surely make you rage like no other. The game only has one level; however, there are many dev logs to come featuring new levels, artwork, etc. I plan to continue working on this game during my freetime to where I can eventually upload it to the apple store. Who knows, maybe it'll be a hit...or maybe it'll flop.
